Package hw1

Class ViewMode

java.lang.Object
hw1.ViewMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mode
public class ViewMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Mode
ViewMode Class do Display the total remaining length of lands on the street. Display the list of buildings on the street display the number and ratio of lenth of playgrounds in the street. calculate the total length of street occupied by the markets, houses or offices.
Author:
berkan
